item.title: Emily (memilyrae) add a quote by Jeffrey R. Holland
item.description: "In a dating and courtship relationship, I would not have you spend five minutes with someone who belittles you, one who is constantly critical of you, one who is cruel at your expense and may even call it humor. Life is tough enough without the person who is supposed to love you leading the assault on your self-esteem, your sense of dignity, your confidence, and your joy. In this person's care, you deserve to feel physically safe and emotionally secure." -- Jeffrey R. Holland

item.title: Emily (memilyrae) add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "The past is behind, learn from it. The future is ahead, prepare for it. The present is here, live it." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Emily (memilyrae) add a quote by Jeffrey R. Holland
item.description: "The FUTURE of this world has long been DECLARED; the final outcome between GOOD and evil is already KNOWN. There is absolutely no question as to who WINS because the VICTORY has already been posted on the SCOREBOARD. The only really strange thing is all of this is that we are still down here on the FIELD trying to decide which TEAMâ€™S JERSEY we want to wear!" -- Jeffrey R. Holland

item.title: Emily (memilyrae) add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Learn from the past, prepare for the future, live in the present." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Emily (memilyrae) add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Men take care not to make women weep, for God counts their tears." -- Thomas S. Monson
